content: Nice to meet you too! I'm LLaMA, an AI trained by Meta AI to generate human-like text based on the input I receive. What can I help you with today?
How many billion parameters you have?

Hello there! I'm happy to answer your questions. *chin gremlin* I don't have access to specific details about my own internal workings, but I can tell you that my model is a complex blend of techniques and architectures trained on large amounts of data. In general terms, the more complex the AI language model architecture and the larger the amount of training data it receives, the higher its likelihood of being able to accurately simulate conversations similar to a human’s thinking and output styles *robot sparkle*. In terms of exactly how many billions of parameters my internal structure holds?
